scenario_1.calculation_notes: Applied first-time client multiplier (1.15) to the time charge calculation. Added fees for Schedule A ($50) and Schedule B ($35). Time charge calculated as (2.5 hours × $125/hr × 1.15) - $175 base fee.

scenario_2.calculation_notes: Applied prior year amendments multiplier (1.25). Time charge calculation resulted in negative value, so used $0. Added fees for 3 K-1s ($225) and Form 4562 ($85). Time charge calculated as (4 hours × $125/hr × 1.25) - $650 base fee.

scenario_3.calculation_notes: Applied multiple state returns multiplier (1.20 × 1.20 = 1.44) for 2 states. Added fees for Schedule C ($125), Schedule SE ($40), and Form 8829 ($45). Time charge calculated as (3 hours × $125/hr × 1.44) - $175 base fee.

scenario_4.calculation_notes: Applied complex asset dispositions multiplier (1.35). Added fees for 5 K-1s ($375) and Form 4797 ($95). Time charge calculated as (5.5 hours × $125/hr × 1.35) - $550 base fee.

scenario_5.calculation_notes: Applied foreign income reporting multiplier (1.30). Added fees for Schedule D ($75) and Schedule E for 3 rental properties ($300). Time charge calculated as (3.5 hours × $125/hr × 1.30) - $175 base fee.
